results.name: Dirichlet convolution of the identity function with A246277.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
Antti Karttunen, Data supplement: n, a(n) computed for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences computed from indices in prime factorization
program: A246277(n) = if(1==n, 0, my(f = factor(n), k = primepi(f[1,1])-1); for (i=1, #f~, f[i,1] = prime(primepi(f[i,1])-k)); factorback(f)/2);
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 12 2019
